macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Mixed on Friday Amid Light Holiday Trading
items.summary: Major US indexes closed slightly lower on Friday, December 26: S&P 500 down 0.1% to 6,929.94, Dow down 0.1% to 48,710.97, Nasdaq down 0.1% to 23,593.10, Russell 2000 down 0.5% to 2,534.35. For the week, S&P 500 up 1.4%, Dow up 1.2%, Nasdaq up 1.2%; year-to-date gains stand at S&P 17.8%, Nasdaq 22.2%.

items.title: Commodity Prices Show Divergence: Gold and Silver Rise, Oil Falls
items.summary: Gold and silver prices rose, with silver up nearly 8% due to supply constraints, while U.S. crude oil fell 2.8% and Treasury yields held steady amid light trading volume.

items.title: Target Shares Climb on Activist Investor Stake News
items.summary: Target shares rose following reports of an activist investor taking a stake in the company, standing out amid otherwise subdued market activity.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Retreats to $87K Amid Year-End Consolidation
items.summary: Bitcoin has slipped to around $87,556, down 1.18% in the past 24 hours and 0.93% over the week, while Ethereum fell 0.89% to $2,934, as markets digest gains amid thin year-end liquidity and geopolitical tensions.

items.title: Institutional Capital Shifts from Bitcoin to Ethereum Signaling Potential Bull Cycle
items.summary: Institutions are reallocating from Bitcoin to Ethereum due to regulatory tailwinds like the U.S. GENIUS Act, Ethereum's 65% Q3 gain vs. Bitcoin's 6%, and surging TVL in DeFi and RWAs, potentially igniting a multi-year bull run.

items.title: CLARITY Act Markup in January Could Spark XRP Rally
items.summary: Expert predicts XRP rally ahead of January 2026 CLARITY Act markup, which aims to clarify U.S. digital asset regulations, following historical pre-law gains; Senate passage could eliminate sector uncertainty.

items.title: Bitcoin ETFs See Record Outflows But Overall $46.7B Inflows in 2025
items.summary: U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded $175M outflows on Dec. 24, but hold $113.8B in assets with $56.9B net inflows since 2024; BlackRock's IBIT alone amassed over $62B, offsetting GBTC redemptions.

items.title: Mike Novogratz Warns XRP and Cardano Must Prove Real-World Utility by 2026
items.summary: Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz states crypto is shifting from hype to usage-driven tokens, urging XRP and Cardano to demonstrate practical value or risk irrelevance in 2026's 'building year'.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Google Releases T5Gemma 2 Multimodal Encoder-Decoder
items.summary: Google unveiled T5Gemma 2, a new multimodal encoder-decoder model highlighted in recent AI updates. This development advances multimodal AI capabilities for enterprise applications.

items.title: Mistral Launches OCR 3 for Advanced Text Recognition
items.summary: Mistral introduced OCR 3, a new optical character recognition model featured in the latest AI news roundup. It enhances AI's ability to process and understand visual text data.

items.title: Nvidia Unveils Nitrogen for Game-Playing AI
items.summary: Nvidia released Nitrogen, a new AI system specialized for game playing, as part of recent miscellaneous AI updates. This signals continued progress in reinforcement learning for gaming.

items.title: Google Introduces Gemini Enterprise Edition
items.summary: Google launched Gemini Enterprise, a business-focused version of its AI model, emphasizing integration into workflows. This reflects the industry's shift toward practical AI deployment.

items.title: Xbox Game Studios Hires Generative AI Experts for Halo Development
items.summary: Xbox replaced Halo: Campaign Evolved staff with generative AI specialists and seeks machine learning scientists for Halo, Forza, and Gears of War. This indicates Microsoft's push for AI in game creation.

items.title: Experts Call for Safeguards as GenAI Embeds in Life Sciences R&D
items.summary: Published today, experts stress high-quality datasets, transparency, and safeguards for generative AI in drug discovery and R&D workflows. Adoption is accelerating but requires trusted methodologies.

items.title: Pittsburgh Advances AI in Agriculture Applications
items.summary: AI is being applied to farming in Pittsburgh, focusing on precision agriculture beyond data centers. This highlights emerging trends in localized AI for environmental and food production.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Nintendo Updates Donkey Kong Bananza on Switch 2 and Launches eShop Sale
items.summary: Nintendo released a new update for Donkey Kong Bananza on the Switch 2 and started a major eShop sale in the US with recommended games. Bloober Team teased 'Project M' for Nintendo platforms, appealing to fans of horror titles like Resident Evil.

items.title: Call of Duty Co-Creator Vince Zampella Passes Away at 55
items.summary: Vince Zampella, co-creator of Call of Duty, has died at age 55, leaving a significant legacy in the gaming industry. Tributes highlight his huge talent and impact.

items.title: Street Fighter 6 December 2025 Patch Notes and Year 3 Character Reveal
items.summary: Capcom released December 2025 patch notes for Street Fighter 6, including a large World Tour mode update with expanded map and new masters. A Year 3 character reveal trailer and Capcom Pro Tour website launch were also announced.

items.title: Street Fighter Movie Sneak Peek Released
items.summary: A sneak peek trailer for the upcoming Street Fighter movie was shared, generating buzz in the fighting game community.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
